properties.name: Hart Plaza
properties.description: Posted by TangsoodoladyHart Plaza DetroitGreat gathering place to see the Detroit River, or walk over from Cobo to the Renaissance Center.

properties.name: Metropark Bike Trail
properties.description: Posted by Tangsoodolady  S. Gibraltar Rd. Ride to Erie Metropark along this 2 mile trail, see the cannons and markers for the Battle of Brownston (War of 1812) and other battles from the French and Indian Wars. Pass through wetlands, wooded trails and open prairie.

properties.name: Renaissance Center
properties.description: Posted by TangsoodoladyRanaissance CenterMulti-Tower skyscraper complex housing General Motors World Headquarters, restaurants, and great views of the city

properties.name: View of the Lower Detroit River
properties.description: Posted by TangsoodoladyStoeflet and Adams Dr.Ride out from Dairy Queen across the bridge and follow to the end of the road. Turn R. on Adams and check out the views of Lake Erie and the Lower Detroit River.
